name: abrexex
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1
body: |- wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))), universe)

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))), universe), wcel(c0, universe))

body.origin:
|- wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))), universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))), universe))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

comment: Existence of a class abstraction of existentially restricted sets. See the comment of ~ abrexexg . See also ~ abrexex2 . (Contributed by NM, 16-Oct-2003.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
